import React from 'react'; import Title from '../Title/Title'; import errow from '../../assets/arrowRight.svg'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import {handleHover, handleHoverExit} from '../NavHamburger/Animations' const Hero = () => { return (
<h1> Website and user interface designer <Link to='/about'> <img className='hero__arrow' src={errow} /> </Link> </h1>
); }; export default Hero;
